member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in a cell.
member.value: The horizontal alignment of the content in a cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.BottomBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom border color.

remarks.p: If the border color is set to a non-default value and the is set to Default, it will be resolved to Thin.

member.value: The bottom border color.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.BottomBorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom border style.

remarks.p: If the border style is set to a non-default value and the is default (Color.Empty), it will be resolved to Color.Black.

member.value: The bottom border style.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.FillPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill pattern in the cell.

remarks.p: If fill pattern is set to Solid, the cell is filled using just the . For all other patterns, both FillPatternForegroundColor and are used.

member.value: The fill pattern in the cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.FillPatternBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the fill pattern.

remarks.p: If the background color is set to a non-default value and is set to Default, resolved fill pattern style is Gray50percent.

member.value: The background color of the fill pattern.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.FillPatternForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color of the fill pattern.

remarks.p: If the foreground color is set to a non-default value and is set to Default, resolved fill pattern style is Solid. There, a solid cell color can easily be applied by setting only the FillPatternForegroundColor.

member.value: The foreground color of the fill pattern.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.FormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the number format string.

remarks.p: For more information on excel format strings, consult Microsoft Excel help.

member.value: The number format string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the default font formatting.

remarks.p: This font formatting is just the default font used in the cell. This can be overridden by strings on a character by character basis by using the class.

member.value: The default font formatting.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.Indent
member.summary: Gets or sets the indent in units of average character widths.
member.exception: The assigned value is outside the valid indent level range of 0 and 15.
member.value: The indent in units of average character widths.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.LeftBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the left border color.

remarks.p: If the border color is set to a non-default value and the is set to Default, it will be resolved to Thin.

member.value: The left border color.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.LeftBorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the left border style.

remarks.p: If the border style is set to a non-default value and the is default (Color.Empty), it will be resolved to Color.Black.

member.value: The left border style.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.Locked
member.summary: Gets or sets the valid which indicates whether the cell is locked in protected mode.

remarks.p: The Locked valid is used in Excel file only if the associated or is protected. Otherwise the value is ignored.

member.value: The valid which indicates whether the cell is locked in protected mode.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.RightBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the right border color.

remarks.p: If the border color is set to a non-default value and the is set to Default, it will be resolved to Thin.

member.value: The right border color.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.RightBorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the right border style.

remarks.p: If the border style is set to a non-default value and the is default (Color.Empty), it will be resolved to Color.Black.

member.value: The right border style.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the cell content in degrees.

remarks.p: Cell text rotation, in degrees; 0 – 90 is up 0 – 90 degrees, 91 – 180 is down 1 – 90 degrees, and 255 is vertical.

member.value: The rotation of the cell content in degrees.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.ShrinkToFit
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the cell content will shrink to fit the cell.

remarks.p: If True, the size of the cell font will shrink so all data fits within the cell.

member.value: The value indicating whether the cell content will shrink to fit the cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.TopBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the top border color.

remarks.p: If the border color is set to a non-default value and the is set to Default, it will be resolved to Thin.

member.value: The top border color.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.TopBorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the top border style.

remarks.p: If the border style is set to a non-default value and the is default (Color.Empty), it will be resolved to Color.Black.

member.value: The top border style.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the content in a cell.
member.value: The vertical alignment of the content in a cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.WorksheetCellFormatSettings.WrapText
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which indicates whether text will wrap in a cell.

remarks.p: If True, and the row associated with the cell has a default , the row's height will automatically be increased to fit wrapped content.

member.value: The value which indicates whether text will wrap in a cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.ExcludeColumnValueConverter
member.summary: Gets / sets if columns which have a value converter applied to them should export the converted value or the original raw value.
member.remarks: If false, then the value will be converted prior to writing to the export stream. If true, the raw value will be exported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.ExcludeColumnFormatString

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Fired when a property changes on the .

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.XamGridRequested
member.summary: Event raised during the exporting process when a new instance of the is going to be created to replicate the which is being exported.
member.remarks: During the exporting process a new is created to control the exporting. The type of the that is created must be the same as the one being exported. This event is raised so that a new instance of the grid can be provided, in cases where the exported grid is a derived grid.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.ExportStarted
member.summary: Occurs at the beginning of the export process. The has been initialized but the data source has not yet been set.

remarks.p: The XamGrid argument returns a reference to the cloned object that is about to be exported.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.ExportEnding
member.summary: Occurs after the exporting process is finished but prior to documentaion finalization.

remarks.p: The Canceled argument is true if exporting process was been canceled.
This event is fired after exporting process is finished and is fired after all other events. Use this event for any post processing of exporter.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.ExportEnded
member.summary: Occurs after the exporter is finished.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Controls.Grids.XamGridExcelExporter.RowExporting
member.summary: Occurs before a is exported to Excel.

remarks.p: The Row argument returns a reference to record being exported.
This event is fired before the row is processed. Use Cancel argument to cancel row exporting.
